column4: hey can anyone help me out im trying to get mplayer to play a dvd i downloaded in fullscreen ... i tried ..  mplayer -vo xv .. that didnt work .. i also hit f while it was playing but that just made the window bigger but not the screen ..anyone got any other ideas??
i think if you press Z in mplayer it will go into fullscreen mode
mplayer --help will give you options. should be either a fullscreen or a "zoom" option. try -zoom first
